title: Unable to connect to the authentication service. Check the server status
body:
MY IP -  46.160.70.147
DNS CHANGE TO 8.8.8.8 - nothing

try to open link "https://auth.riotgames.com/.well-known/openid-configuration" 
Error 1016 Ray ID: 3947bdccc8e08ace â€¢ 2017-08-26 15:14:33 UTC
Origin DNS error

This problem at the moment all players form CIS region

replies.body: I ran as admin and changed servers then changed back to my original server and it worked for me.
Run as admin it worked for me

Not sure if you're still dealing with this issue at this time, but if you're still having this problem lets get you over to the [Tech Team](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to take a closer look.
